subject: Football
Firearms
lead_paragraph: Johnson was arrested Friday in Orlando, Fla., on misdemeanor weapons charges, the police said. He was charged with open carrying of weapons/firearms, a second-degree misdemeanor in Florida.
snippet: Johnson was arrested Friday in Orlando, Fla., on misdemeanor weapons charges, the police said. He was charged with open carrying of weapons/firearms, a second-degree misdemeanor in Florida.
